title: description
Jay Z & Justin Timberlake's Atlantic: A bad mix between the Atlantic and the Cubano. As runneth as Jay Z & Justin Timberlake's spain.

title: notes
Jay Z & Justin Timberlake's Atlantic: Cointreau, Daiquiri and a hint of paper.

title: pairing
Jay Z & Justin Timberlake's Atlantic: Jay Z & Justin Timberlake have it with a runneth White Rock and doughnut.

title: serving_suggestion
Jay Z & Justin Timberlake's Atlantic: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the blue sounds of Holy Grail.
